snippet.title: Gangstar: Miami Vindication - iPhone/iPod touch trailer by Gameloft
snippet.description:
Enjoy the most immersive full-3D crime simulation ever on iPhone/iPod touch! Gangstar: Miami Vindication has a new, unique feel that delivers a deep storyline of revenge: plunge into Miami gang life and live a fast-paced adventure to liberate your little brother.

ENTER OUR FACEBOOK CONTEST and win 30 collector Gangstar headset (courtesy of ASTRO Gaming)
http://www.facebook.com/notes.php?id=216238295505&notes_tab=app_2347471856#!/note.php?note_id=448940673504

iPhone release: Sept 23, 2010
iPad release: October, 2010

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
